name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato

steps.name: Prepare Workspace
steps.description: Dust work surface with flour, prepare baking sheet with parchment paper

steps.name: Shape Dough
steps.description: Stretch or roll pizza dough into desired shape on prepared sheet

steps.name: Add Sauce
steps.description: Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough, leaving a border for crust

steps.name: Add Cheese
steps.description: Tear fresh mozzarella and distribute evenly over sauce

steps.name: Drizzle Oil
steps.description: Drizzle olive oil over pizza and season with salt and pepper

steps.name: Bake
steps.description: Bake pizza in preheated oven for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden

steps.name: Add Basil
steps.description: Remove from oven and add fresh basil leaves

steps.name: Cool & Serve
steps.description: Let cool for 2 minutes, slice, and serve
